title: Babel Street

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $924.6K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Babel Street. The average
  contract duration was 1.05 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $521.3K. The longest
  contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.4M.
lookup_name: 'BABEL STREET'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '924.6K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '9%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '142%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.05'
s421_mean_contract_value: '521.3K'
s425_max_duration: '5'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.4M'
---
